channel.title: Sara brews

item.title: Sara brews
item.dc:creator: @redrover redrover
item.description:
@redrover wrote:

Hi, i’ve tryed to make sara brews so that when you drink them u get def + alittle heal And decrease attk and str alittle.
Any1 can tell me how i decrease attk and str while drinking it?
I’m using a potionhandler so…

This is what i used for Def Up.

            case 6685: // Sara Brew (4)
                c.defPot = true;
                c.defPotTimer = 90;
                c.abc = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]);
                c.cba = c.abc / 10;
                c.aaa = c.cba / 2;
                c.abc2 = c.aaa + c.cba;
                if (c.abc2 <= 1) {
                c.abc2 = 2;
                }
                c.playerLevel[1] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]);
                c.playerLevel[1] += c.abc2;
                c.sendFrame126(""+c.playerLevel[1]+"", 4008);
                c.deleteItem(6685, c.GetItemSlot(6685), 1);
                c.addItem(6687, 1);
		c.setAnimation(829);
                c.updateRequired = true;
                c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
                GoOn = false;
                break;

Read full topic
